summary: This document contains a mix of deposition transcripts of Ghislaine Maxwell from 2016 and earlier correspondence related to Jeffrey Epstein's properties and activities. The depositions focus on Maxwell's knowledge of Epstein's activities with underage girls and sexual activities at his properties. The correspondence includes letters and flight logs from the 1990s.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Deposed about her knowledge of Jeffrey Epstein's activities with underage girls and sexual activities at his properties.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the case, mentioned in connection with properties, flights, and alleged activities with underage girls.

persons.name: Leslie Fagin
persons.context: Recorded the deposition of Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Mr. Pagliuca
persons.context: Objected to questions during Ghislaine Maxwell's deposition.

connections.description: Maxwell was closely associated with Epstein, as evidenced by her deposition testimony and correspondence.
Pagliuca represented Maxwell during her deposition, objecting to questions on her behalf.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Deposition
events.description: Videotaped deposition of Ghislaine Maxwell regarding her knowledge of Jeffrey Epstein's activities.

events.title: Continued Ghislaine Maxwell Deposition
events.description: Continued videotaped deposition of Ghislaine Maxwell regarding her knowledge of Jeffrey Epstein's activities.

events.title: Interlochen Scholarship Lodge Letter
events.description: Letter thanking Jeffrey Epstein for a generous gift to Interlochen Arts Camp for a new scholarship lodge.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York
358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, Florida
49 Zorro Ranch Road, Stanley, New Mexico
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell denied knowledge of Jeffrey Epstein's sexual activities with underage girls during her deposition.
Correspondence from 1994 shows Epstein's financial contributions to Interlochen Arts Camp.
Flight logs from the 1990s indicate travel associated with Epstein's properties.
